Mayor & City Council
====================

Rules of Decorum and Citizen Comments
-------------------------------------

1. [Resolution No 2025-036 Rules for Decorum (PDF)](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/6e2c3606-091b-41f4-9324-c9329ea884a9?cache=1800)
2. [Public Comment Form](https://farmersbranchtx-portal.app.transform.civicplus.com/forms/21090)
3. [Formulario de Comentarios Públicos](https://farmersbranchtx-portal.app.transform.civicplus.com/forms/22601)

Council Districts, Agendas, Video
---------------------------------

* [District Map (PDF)](https://www.farmersbranchtx.gov/asset/b587099d-5910-467f-b89d-504e9905cc85)
* [City Council District Lookup App](/1360/City-Council-District-Look-Up)
* [View upcoming agendas](https://farmersbranch.legistar.com/Calendar.aspx)
* [View City Council Meetings](https://www.farmersbranchtx.gov/206/Farmers-Branch-TV) live, rebroadcast or on-demand

General Number for All City Council Members
-------------------------------------------

972-919-2515  
See below for individual cell phone numbers.

**Terry Lynne** **Mayor**
-------------------------

![Terry Lynne](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/ca0bd388-c73c-4517-8380-0a6fdd3eedcb)

* [Email Mayor Lynne](mailto:terry.lynne@farmersbranchtx.gov)
* Cell: 214-244-1615
* First elected 2023, term expires 2026
* City Hall Office Hours: Fridays from 9:15 am to 10:15 am

**Lupe Gonzalez** **District 1**
--------------------------------

![](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/7467c19a-26aa-40ef-bf98-722f0c38f7af)

* [Email Lupe Gonzalez](mailto:lupe.gonzalez@farmersbranchtx.gov)
* Cell: 972-261-7734
* First elected 2025, Term expires 2028

**Tina Bennett-Burton** **Mayor Pro Tem, District 2**
-----------------------------------------------------

![Tina Bennett-Burton](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/b1c7c9e5-5514-41a8-aeea-b226dc5aec43)

* [Email Tina Bennett-Burton](mailto:tina.bennettburton@farmersbranchtx.gov)
* Cell: 214-718-7832
* First elected 2024, term expires 2026
* [October 2025 Town Hall Presentation](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/3cce5212-5573-4010-9344-218100a34e29)
* [October 2025 Town Hall Video](https://youtu.be/qeSF2dWcplc)

David Reid
----------

District 3a man wearing a hat
-----------------------------

* [Email David Reid](mailto:david.reid@farmersbranchtx.gov)
* Cell: 214-471-4091
* First elected 2024, term expires 2027
* [November 2024 Town Hall Presentation](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/38b10748-023e-406a-89e4-8ffd7f229839)
